title: Are the 10 year icon/skin shipping seperately?
body: Basically, title. I got the Kayle skin but not the icon. Are they coming out separately or should they be together?

replies.body: Gifts are being rolled out individually and will take time for everything to finish being sent out.  Stay up to date through our [support banner](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-)!  Let me know if you have any questions.
